SEARCH
Module makao

Package makao.server

package makao.server
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Client
    The Client class is responsible for handling all client-side communication with the server.
    ClientMessage
    Class representing a message sent from the client to the server.
    NamesAndStoredDetails
    The NamesAndStoredDetails class implements Serializable, and is responsible for storing player information such as name, password, avatar path, and number of won games.
    SaveAndRestoreData
    The SaveAndRestoreData class provides methods to save and restore the state of a NamesAndStoredDetails object to/from a binary file.
    Server
    The Server class is responsible for handling the socket connections and creating new game rooms for players to play in.
    ServerGame
    The ServerGame class is responsible for handling the state of a game of Makao on the server side.
    ServerMessage
    The class ServerMessage is used to represent the messages sent by the server to the clients.
    ServerPlayer
    The class ServerPlayer implements the Runnable interface and is responsible for handling the communication between the server and a single client.
